description: IME Savior - Fix Windows 11 third-party input method first letter bug
notes: IME Savior fixes a Windows 11 bug with third-party input methods.
Problem: When touch keyboard is enabled in Windows 11, third-party IMEs
have a bug where the first letter is always English after copying text.
Solution: This tool automatically opens and closes the touch keyboard
for 1 second to fix the IME bug. Run it once after each system restart.
- Run manually: Execute 'ImeSavior' or use the Start Menu shortcut
- Auto-startup: Add to Windows startup folder for automatic fix
Note: If auto-close fails during startup, manually close the touch keyboard.
